entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 12:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
